title: TC-GAT: Graph Attention Network for Temporal Causality Discovery. (arXiv:2304.10706v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: The present study explores the intricacies of causal relationship extraction, a vital component in the pursuit of causality knowledge. Causality is frequently intertwined with temporal elements, as the progression from cause to effect is not instantaneous but rather ensconced in a temporal dimension. Thus, the extraction of temporal causality holds paramount significance in the field. In light of this, we propose a method for extracting causality from the text that integrates both temporal and causal relations, with a particular focus on the time aspect. To this end, we first compile a dataset that encompasses temporal relationships. Subsequently, we present a novel model, TC-GAT, which employs a graph attention mechanism to assign weights to the temporal relationships and leverages a causal knowledge graph to determine the adjacency matrix. translated_abstract: 本研究探讨了因果关系提取的复杂性，这是追求因果知识的重要组成部分。因果关系常常与时间元素交织在一起，因为从因果关系到效应的演变不是即时的，而是包含在时间维度中。因此，提取时间因果关系在该领域具有至关重要的意义。针对这一问题，我们提出了一种从文本中提取因果关系的方法，该方法集成了时间和因果关系，特别关注时间方面。为此，我们首先编制了一个集成了时间关系的数据集。随后，我们提出了一种新颖的模型TC-GAT，它使用图注意机制为时间关系分配权重，并利用因果知识图来确定相邻矩阵。此外，我们实现了一个平衡机制，以调节时间和因果关系之间的相互作用。我们的实验证明了这种方法的有效性。
tldr: 本方法提出了一个新颖的TC-GAT模型，使用图注意机制处理时间间隔之间的关系，利用因果知识图来确定相邻矩阵，以提取因果关系。实验证实了该方法的有效性。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a novel TC-GAT model that utilizes a graph attention mechanism to process temporal relationships and leverages a causal knowledge graph to determine the adjacency matrix, aiming to extract causality from the text. Experimental results show the effectiveness of this method.
